page.title: 09SCHOOLS IN WELWYN
page.content: In Welwyn and the North-West of Welwyn Garden City there are six schools. St. Mary's School is situated in London Road, Welwyn, and the head is Mr M J A Jones. Mrs J M Broom is the Headmistress of Tenterfield Nursery. Homerswood School is in Kirklands, Welwyn Garden City, the Headmaster is Mr J W Drew. The other primary school is called Templewood, and is in Pentley Park; the headmaster is Mr B P Jones. The one private school in the area is Sherrardswood, situated in large grounds within Lockleys Park with the Senior Department at Sherrardswood Road.
